summary: Simple mod that adds the ability to move map with x360 controller directional buttons(D-pad).
descriptionHtml:
/==================\
|Move map with D-pad|
\==================/

Simple mod that adds the ability to move map with x360
controller directional buttons(D-pad).

Use optional file if you want to have 8 hotkeys as opposed vanilla 2.

==========================================================

Install:
Use Download with Nexus Mod Manager.
or
Copy Data file to where \Skyrim\Data folder is.
It will ask you if you want to overwrite the Data folder.
Say yes. File path should look like this:

STEAM\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Interface\Controls\pc\

Uninstall: Delete files.
==========================================================

Any way to increase the speed at which it moves the map?

Open skyrim.ini located in "My documents\my games\skyrim\"
Find line [MapMenu], if non existent, add it.
Paste this under [MapMenu]:
fMapMoveKeyboardSpeed=0.025
You can change value, if you want to move map even faster than my chosen speed.

Hotkey mappings:
LB+(Y) :: open favorites menu
D-pad Up :: Hotkey 1
D-pad Right :: Hotkey 2
D-pad Down :: Hotkey 3
D-pad Left :: Hotkey 4
Sprint+D-pad Up :: Hotkey 5
Sprint+D-pad Right :: Hotkey 6
Sprint+D-pad Down :: Hotkey 7
Sprint+D-pad Left :: Hotkey 8
L-stick - :: navigate favorites menu
